title: The reporte of a bloudie and terrible massacre in the citty of Mosco with the fearefull and tragicall end of Demetrius the last Duke, before him raigning at this present.
author: Russell, William, fl. 1607.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by Val. Sims, for Samuel Macham, and Mathew Cooke, and are to be sold at their shop in Paules Churchyard, at the signe of the Tigers head,
